Class Model

  • java.lang.Object
    • Model
  • public class Model
extends java.lang.Object
    Manage the state of the game. One deck is used by two actors. Cards move one-at-a-time between actors.

    • Method Detail

      • setLastCard

        public void setLastCard​(int last)
        Change the total number of cards. The default value is 52. Most card game applications should not call this.

      • getNoCard

        int getNoCard()
        Return the special value that indicates a dealer or player has no cards.

      • getDealerTop

        public int getDealerTop()
        Identify the top card on the dealer's deck. By default, cards are numbered 1 to 52. Returns an indicator value dealer has no cards.
        See Also:
        getNoCard()

        public int getDealerHeight()
        Identify the number of cards in the dealer's deck.
